website_summaries.verdict: CHI's lightweight, leave-in keratin conditioner that works well for fine, minimally-damaged hair.
pros: Extremely easy to use - simply spritz it in your hair, no rinsing required
Lightweight consistency doesn't weigh hair down
cons: Effectiveness may not be notable for very dry, damaged hair
May make hair feel a little stiff once it dries

customer_reviews.title: Dupe for It's a 10 Keratin?
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a dupe because I've been waiting for It's a 10 to drop their prices LOL it gets the job done, but the smell isn't all that and it takes a few more sprays than normal. But for 16$ im pretty happy with it! I have very think frizzy/wavy hair I just add a little water and spray this on. Left side of my hair is with the CHI the right side has nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Do not like at all
customer_reviews.text: The product left a dull residue in my hair. And after only using it a few times it left my hair very brittle and after I brushed my hair I found pieces of the bottom of my hair all over the sink. And when the product came, quite a bit had leaked out in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It's light and it smells nice. It makes my hair shiny and healthy. The bottle lasts quite a while, too. I'm on my second bottle, and it's definitely become part of my routine. I have very fine hair and it can be challenging to find a product that doesn't weigh it down, so I am thrilled with this keratin mist.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cotter-Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love how light-weight it is
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. My stylists often report that my hair is strong and healthy. I attribute that to this product. I love how light-weight it is! I have very fine hair that is easily weighed down by products, so I have to be super careful. No worries with this one! It also has a nice smell. I did have one stylist tell me not to use keratin spray daily, but no one else has seconded her statement so I'm not sure how valid it was. I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: research again will never buy
customer_reviews.text: Just tried all of the product and all of them had my hair worse than when I started. I will never purchased. I can understand why you might not take them all back due to the time frame a person will try the product. But, they are hard on curly hair and scalp.
customer_reviews.author: C L-Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad, overall eh
customer_reviews.text: Just received in the mall today. Bottle is a fairly generous size but made cheaply for the price. The nozzle does not press down all the way, and appears to be somewhat broken. Still works, but the stream that comes out is dispersed. Product smells gross imo. Haven’t used it long enough to see if it helps my hair, but it is lightweight and doesn’t weigh my hair down.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: wonderful conditioner
customer_reviews.text: awesome conditioner, very light weight and leaves hair soft and shiny. I alternate with other Chi products so no build up. This is a great leave in
customer_reviews.author: Country Hick

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, that's all.
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful & light weight. Couldnt see nor feel any difference in my hair. Too much money just for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For many years I have loved how healthy it makes my hair after hair color and when I used my chi. It comes in a sealed plastic. Wear it did not leak From this seller. Not my favorite smell but very healthy. My nose might not like it but my hair does. After the next application product you don't smell it. Will not have to wash hair all the time if you use all applications. Makes your hair healthier. And smell good. You will definitely love the shine and the vitamins and moisturizer you get.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent, unisex.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing compares to my Paul Mitchell Quinoa spray...that no longer is being made....I'm so upset. Now, I am on the search for something similar. I have yet to find anything. Chi is okay. Nothing entirely special, smells fresh. My hair still looks healthy so I thinkmit works decently. Husband uses it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Will Affect Color-treated Hair
customer_reviews.text: I knew that my Keratin treatments changed the color of my color-treated hair, but I didn't realize that using Chi's Keratin Mist would, too. I color my hair medium brown, and after a week of using this spray on dry hair before heat styling, my hair had lightened significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriesland

customer_reviews.title: a disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a light to medium hair spray, but I got neither. This product has no ability to keep hair in place, no matter how much spray is applied. I even poured some in my hands and massaged it into my hair. Still basically no hold.
customer_reviews.author: mike dippel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product that our breeder recommended. So happy to have it and use it constantly
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product that our breeder recommended. So happy to have it and use it constantly
customer_reviews.author: Greg Colton

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent and good to refresh hair throughout the day
customer_reviews.text: I started using this to spray on my ends at night before I throw my hair in a bun. Not sure how helpful it is to my hair health but the scent is so nice that it is worth using it as a refresher throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA NANCE

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t live without this product, my hair is thin and tangled when washed.. this makes brushing so much easier. They used to sell it in stores but I can’t find it anymore, so I’m happy I found it on this site.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: I use a professional dryer and my hair looks better without this product
customer_reviews.text: Not for me, didn’t see what the most of the reviews say. I have curly and freeze hair. I use a professional dryer and my hair looks better without this product. I don’t like the smell. I threw it away
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Mendez

customer_reviews.title: MY Hair UGH!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to grow out my hair. It is think and wavy and uncontrollable. This Product helps me out a brush through it, keep it healthy looking and Less frizz!
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Decreased hair breakage using this
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is both a detangler and a strengthener for my hair after showers. I have to pull my hair back for work each day and noticed that after using this post shower my fine hair is in better condition. Fewer breakages etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds texture
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine thin hair and after a month I can feel the difference in the texture when I shampoo. I use a very small cosmetic plastic spray bottle which makes it much easier to apply after I shampoo and towel dry my hair. Just comb through afterwards to distribute evenly throughout your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff mainly because the scent of it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff mainly because the scent of it is SEXY to me. Reminds me of that fresh smell cologne my guy wears. Turns me on. Product feels light & gentle on my hair. No stickiness. No stiffness. Feels like it can also help to detangle your hair after a shower. Not sure how to notice if it's strengthing like it says.
customer_reviews.author: Sinny

customer_reviews.title: Instant DE tangles and smoothing
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but I'm not a fan really of the spray mechanism. You have to pump it so, so many times to get enough of the product out. But I do love the product
customer_reviews.author: Nashville shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I'm buying it not the first time. My hair really needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: and it leaves my hair smelling great, softer
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a leave in conditioner. Found out quickly that it's not. lol. I still use it frequently though. I have wavy hair, and I spray this on my wavy dry hair, and it leaves my hair smelling great, softer, and more straight. Will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: It goes on the hair easily and has a very nice smell
customer_reviews.text: This product works well in my thin hair. It goes on the hair easily and has a very nice smell. I see less hair and hair breakage since I have started using this product. However, I only use it one to two times a week. js
customer_reviews.author: jstucky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and really helps with the humidity in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product does wonders for your hair. A few spritzes after washing helps to control hair and keep it in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: amgp2

customer_reviews.title: Its a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy it it, makes my hair feel soft and it protects my hair so I always use it, little to no damage, other then when I'm just dumb. Just don't use to much or you will weight down your hair, a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Fatigue

customer_reviews.title: A good leave in!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this popular line/ product in a lot of hair care videos and decided to try. I have fine relaxed hair and was worried that this leave in might weigh my hair down but it didn’t at all. I like the smell and it actually detangles. I’m glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tedra Green

customer_reviews.title: I liked this spray for when I straightened my hair
customer_reviews.text: I liked this spray for when I straightened my hair, the only reason I have not ordered more is because I rarely straighten my hair and this bottle will last me awhile. I love the smell and it doesn't weigh my hair down.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell, and I do notice some extra shine, but I think there may be some alcohol in it because instead of leaving it smooth and silky, I feel like it has more grip,which made it so I use it mostly when I curl my hair and need some extra hold on the curling wand and a lighter product.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey crouch

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Won't purchase again. Nothing "wowing". I've used CHI before and loved the line, but branched out. Doesn't really make hair any softer; fat bottle shape makes it awkward to spray.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty333

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit description
customer_reviews.text: This product was not as described. Writing had come off upon delivery. Very disappointed. I’m 99% this is not real.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian J.

customer_reviews.title: On the fence about it
customer_reviews.text: I love the Chi smell, which is why I purchased this to give my hair a scent boost, but the smell begins to weaken and change after a while.
customer_reviews.author: EsJay

customer_reviews.title: Its ok not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I dont care for the way it makes my hair feel dry and brittle I wanted something that left my hair soft like conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: as my hair is very fine and tangles easy
customer_reviews.text: I use this so it is easier to brush my hair, as my hair is very fine and tangles easy. I've tried detangling sprays but nothing compares to this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied:(
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad batch, but this was super sticky - more like a hairspray
customer_reviews.author: j.me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have very kinky curly thick hair and this protects and strengthens my hair when I straighten it
customer_reviews.author: Victoria J

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my frizzy hair. I love how soft my hair is after I use it and it even helped de tangle as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Straighten and untangle
customer_reviews.text: Best protection for flat iron, and untangles hair. Well worth the money . Tina G.🌸
customer_reviews.author: Martina Gilles

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing I pressed my hair as well as my bundle I'm not a hair professional but when I say inamnpleased.... I am pleased great for flat ironing
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: ... used this product for 17 years on my very fine, easily broke and tangled hair
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 17 years on my very fine, easily broke and tangled hair. It protects and prevent breakage, and helps release the tangled easily, prevents damage when I had my hair colored.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Look for something more creamier
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money made my hair dry and break off badly. I should have known better leave in spray conditioners are always krapp for me. How stick to the creamy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and a great addition to my daily hair care routine. I would suggest to anyone who want a little pick me up after a fresh shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Tdc9112

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing For Hair
customer_reviews.text: Helps nourish hair. Helps reduce frizz. Has a great scent. Does not weigh hair down. Highly recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Silky Soft Hair
customer_reviews.text: This Chi Silk Infusion makes my hair so soft and doesn't weigh it down!
customer_reviews.author: Amber370

customer_reviews.title: Product of the decade
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It's light weight and makes your hair look shiny and healthy. The bottle lasts a long time and I cannot imagine using any other product after washing my hair. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't seem to be really be doing much and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: doesn't seem to be really be doing much and it's heavy in my hair, lots of build up with this.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Guza

customer_reviews.title: CHI. TRY ALL THEIR PRODUCTS-THEYRE AMAZING 👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and it always makes my long hair soft and tangle free.
customer_reviews.author: Mares

customer_reviews.title: great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I wash my hair every other day to strengthen my hair along with a moisturizing shampoo and it works great together. Be careful that you don't use too much keratin because it can actually be bad for your hair. Just enough, a little bit goes a long way so be careful or you can do more harm than good. But definitely will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff and definitely genuine. I love the smell too. It's not overpowering or "chemically" like many of the protectants are.
customer_reviews.author: JKM4410

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it but dont add much shine to the hair but give it a really good press out
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This has all but ended my split-end nightmare. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mooers

customer_reviews.title: Blow-out staple
customer_reviews.text: I'm natural and use this keratin mist for my blow-outs. I love it and it's a staple product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky7

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love how my hair feels when I use this product. Very lightweight and smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great detangler
customer_reviews.text: This is the best detangler for my wavy fine hair that doesn’t feel heavy or leave a residue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this product and have been using it for several years now.
customer_reviews.author: katc

customer_reviews.title: I am not exavtly sure what this does to help ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not exavtly sure what this does to help. After I have sprayed it, I find my hair is really hard to brush through. May not go here again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I've used Keratin mist by CHI for a while. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used Keratin mist by CHI for a while. It makes your hair silky soft and is a must in a dry climate.
customer_reviews.author: peggy kempf

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years! It never disappoints! Great for fine hair...won't weigh it down at all!
customer_reviews.author: S. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and it has such a clean smell. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: left my hair feeling crunchy like straw. my hair is not processed
customer_reviews.text: left my hair feeling crunchy like straw. my hair is not processed. its naturally gray and seeming more flyaway than before i went gray. thought this would help, was a waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Ms Priss

customer_reviews.title: Did very little for my hair.  Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Nope. Did very little for my full but fine hair. It did not soften. I ended up throwing it away after a month. I like things to work well.
customer_reviews.author: K R TTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Used to grow super long, now I cant get it to grow ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble in the last year with breakage to the point that my hair is now about 3 inches shorter on its own than it used to be. Used to grow super long, now I cant get it to grow any longer and I see breakage on sides. I've tried a lot of treatments, but this was one of the best I've tried. I found my hair softer and easy to brush or managed without as much breakage. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: My must have hair product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have very fine, straight hair and I use this product every day after I get out of the shower. it keeps it straight and from getting frizzy and helps prevent breakage. The sale on amazon was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: K. P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results fast!
customer_reviews.text: I have thyroid cancer and the treatment has caused many issues with my hair. One day with this product and I noticed a difference immediately, my hair is back to the smooth silky feel that I have been missing! I have now been using it every day and my hair is looking so shiny! I am so happy with the results from this product! Chi has sold me on their line through this product alone!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. and Mrs. Rabidoux

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is really good it will leave your hair soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Always use this and cheaper than buying in the store.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product glad to see that amazon carries it so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Leisa Michelle McKinney

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST! I noticed a difference right after the first use, my hair was smoother and way softer!! Definitely recommend this, I have really thick and frizzy hair and this made it so much healthier and manageable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but bad spray bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well. Left my hair looking shiny. Only downside is the bottle indents a lot while using it, it was hard to spray. I recommend transferring hair spray to a different spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to share
customer_reviews.text: Have been giving this to friends as a gift, and they love it. Smell is mild and nice. Our hair is looking great. The sprayer hasn't broken, is well made.
customer_reviews.author: esporter

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely continue to use
customer_reviews.text: Chi is a great brand for my hair. I use heat products so this helps protect
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great for every other day strengthening
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I wouldn't recommend using every day, maybe every other day as too much Keratin could cause additional breakage. Great scent and great consistency, not watered down at all!
customer_reviews.author: Paisley

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. Left my hair a little sticky. Other than that. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It smells really good.
customer_reviews.text: I can see a big difference in my hair, not as dry or damaged. It smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair a little greasy
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it does protect my hair, however it does seem to leave my hair a little greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Rue Sinclear

customer_reviews.title: Top Rated for healthy shiny hair!
customer_reviews.text: Keratin is one of the best things about hair - lose your shine, add it back. Too rated product a expensive, but worth every penny for those bad hair days. Spray, use the blow dryer a minute to fluff and BAM, fresh do! Smells great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been feeling quite porous and fragile after a series of dye experiments so I really needed a product like this. I spray this all over on my damp hair and comb it through, then style. Unexpectedly, this makes my hair very straight without the aid of a straightener (I have naturally wavy hair). After a couple of weeks, I feel my hair is regaining some of its strength and some of my problem areas (rubbery hair) are not so noticeable. I do not use this in conjunction with any other Chi products, just my own favorite shampoos and conditioners. I use other products to give my hair shine and for anti-frizz.
customer_reviews.author: CountessMC

customer_reviews.title: Great spray!
customer_reviews.text: Live this spray been using MIT for a few years now, helped me grow out all my hair from being bleached to my natural,color for the last 2 years , helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: veronica star

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. After applying my hair is soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: RC Vale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff . Definitely helps with my damaged hair .
customer_reviews.author: Katya

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely didn't help with anything. It dried my scalp out and made my hair frizz.
customer_reviews.author: iyana morgan britt

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Makes my hair so shiny and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee

customer_reviews.title: Best kept secret
customer_reviews.text: I love and swear by this stuff! I use it to slick my hair into a ballerina bun, my hairline hates me.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best de-tangling product out there. Softens and de-tangles instantly! :)

customer_reviews.title: Smells like men’s cologne
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife and daughter. Both of them refused to use it because it smells like men’s cologne.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leo

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product the first time my stylist used it on my hair 6 years ago, i knew i would enjoy it for my silk pressed hair. Yes honey, this works well too!
customer_reviews.author: Cierstan Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using this product for a long time ,keeps my hair healthy
customer_reviews.author: AdrianaUAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!!! They sell this in stores for 2-3x as much. This took awhile to arrive, but I think it only seemed that way because I was so excited to receive it. I can tell a difference in my hair and I love it.

customer_reviews.title: New Fav
customer_reviews.text: I love CHI products and I'm happy I added this one on to my collection. It really helps get my hair straighten
customer_reviews.author: Claudasia

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used to straighten my hair a lot without heat protectant and it made my hair very dry and dull. The CHI Keratin Mist makes my hair look shiny and moisturized. Its very light weight and I really like that it is a spray form because it makes it easier to use. It also leaves a pleasant clean scent. I love this product and I love what it does for my hair!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far, the product is functional, but the fragrance is very soothing

customer_reviews.title: CHI is one of the best hair products on the market in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: CHI products are amazing. They really tame the hair and make it very healthy. My hair feels really good and nicely hydrated whenever I use CHI products on it.

customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice spray and smells great! I am a Chi fan and use their products. I was looking for something that has a nice scent to it.

product_meta.title: CHI Keratin Mist ,12 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
CHI Keratin Mist is an advance leave-in spray that provides hair with strength, protection and softness while leaving hair silky and shiny with incredible manageability.

BRAND STORY
CHI haircare and tools are manufactured by Farouk Systems a Houston based company.
feature_bullets: Provide hair with strength, protection and softness while leaving hair silky and shiny
Leaves hair stronger and more manageable
Spray evenly throughout the hair and leave in, proceed with styling

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
